Title:               Interest Rates, Discount Rate for United States
Series ID:           INTDSRUSM193N
Source:              International Monetary Fund
Release:             International Financial Statistics (Not a Press Release)
Seasonal Adjustment: Not Seasonally Adjusted
Frequency:           Monthly
Units:               Percent per Annum
Date Range:          1950-01-01 to 2020-03-01
Last Updated:        2020-04-20 7:03 AM CDT
Notes:               Notes regarding this series can be found in International Financial
                     Statistics Yearbooks produced by the International Monetary Fund
                     (IMF). We have requested these publications from the IMF. Notes on
                     this series will populate once they become available.
                     
                     Copyright Â© 2016, International Monetary Fund. Reprinted with
                     permission. Complete terms of use and contact details are available
                     from the IMF (http://www.imf.org/external/terms.htm).
